text_content: $PAXG Expect a good growth in the short term . Fed Chair Powell new investigation news are good news for precious metals oil and some crypto currencies!

$PAXG  has delivered a strong impulsive move after defending the $4,600 demand zone. Price is currently trading around $4,596, holding firmly above the ascending trendline and showing constructive momentum.  Immediate resistance sits at $4,790, which is the next key level to watch. A decisive break above this zone would confirm continuation toward higher targets, while failure to sustain demand could expose downside risk back into the $4,400â€“$4,300 range.  Market structure suggests $PAXG  is building strength within a developing bullish trend. Traders will be monitoring reactions at resistance to validate whether this setup evolves into a breakout toward new highs or extends consolidation along the trendline.   #PAXG  #Macro Insights#  #Altcoin Season#  #BTC Price Analysis#  #Bullish
